dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 3831 IH: Florida Safe Seas Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Webster of Florida (for himself and Mr. Soto) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act to prohibit feeding sharks in the exclusive economic zone off the State of Florida.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Florida Safe Seas Act of 2025.

section.header: Prohibition on feeding sharks in exclusive economic zone off State of Florida
section.text: Section 317 of the Magnuson-Stevens Fishery Conservation and Management Act (16 U.S.C. 1866) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking the State and inserting the States; and
by inserting and Florida after Hawaii.
